subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ADDING TO THE IMPORTANT MESSAGE
author: Ursula Bielski
full_text:
--0-884082551-1196297098=:78249
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Bruce,
  I just wanted to drop a line and say Amen!   Granted, the electronic element is the "e" in EVP (and the "i" in ITC), but the most accomplished researchers (including Maggy and Jules, Konstantin and Friedrich, and yes, Mark Macy, insist that if you have the harmony, love, and RESONANCE among researchers, all the electronic problems can be overcome.  
  Is anyone involved in the AA-EVP "Big Circle" group?  I see that they attempt contact all at once from their own homes around the country, I think on Thursday evenings at a set time.
  Is anyone interested in this?  From what I see, and from my own new interest, it seems most of us try contacts as much as possible throughout the day.  Anyone want to try a set time?
  Ursula

Lance Oliver <orbhunterx@...> wrote:
          Hello Bruce,

Forgive me for bluntness, but typing in all capital letters is 
considered to be shouting by some of us. It's also hard to follow. 

Absolutely no offense intended... I just thought you should know.

Thanks,
Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> HI GUY'S JUST A SHORT EXPLANATION OF WHAT I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO 
GATHER.
> 
> 
> 
> ANYONE THAT IS A SERIOUS EVP RESEARCHER HAS PROBABLY READ THE 
ARTICLES 
> AND OR BOOKS PERTAINING TO THE EALY TIME STREAM EXPERIMENTS AND 
WHAT 
> WAS CALLED THE CIRCLE OF LIGHT. IT INVOLVED SUCH RESEARCHERS AS 
MAGGY 
> HERSHBACH AND HER HUSBAND THAT WHERE THE RECIPIENTS OF LONG LENGTHY 
> MESSAGES IN ALL DIFFERENT FORMATS FROM THE SPIRIT WORLD THEY IN 
TURN 
> WORKED WITH SUCH EVP PIONEERS AS HANS MUELLER, KONSTANTINE 
> RAUDIVA,GEORGE MEEK AND MARK MACY TO NAME A FEW. THESE EARLY 
PIONEERS 
> THROUGH THE HERSHBACHS IN LUXEMBORG RECIEVED DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS 
ON 
> HOW TO FURTHER COMMUNICATION THAT NOT ONLY LED TO OUR CURRENT EVP 
> GATHERING TECHNIQUES BUT ALSO THE MOTHER OF ALL BOXES THE SPIRICOM.
> THESE RESEARCHERS WERE TOLD THE MOST IMPORTANT INGREDIANT IN THE 
> STRENGTH AND FURTHERENCE OF SPIRIT COMMUNICATION WAS HARMONY AND 
PEACE 
> AND GOOD INTENTIONS WITHIN THIS CIRCLE THEY HAD BEEN LED TO FORM.
> 
> BUT SADLY AS HUMAN BEINGS USUALLY DO JELOUSY AND EGO BECAME A 
POISON TO 
> THE CIRCLE AND SOME INDIVIDUALS THAT WHERE ENVIOUS OF OTHERS 
SUPERIOR 
> SUCESSES BROUGHT BAD VIBRATIONSS TO THE GROUP AND THE CIRCLE WAS 
BROKEN.
> 
> IMMEDIATLY FOLLOWING THE ADVANCED COMMUNICATION THAT HAD BEEN 
ENJOYED 
> FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS SLOWLY DWINDLED AWAY.
> 
> NOW I BELIEVE WE ARE BEING GIVEN A SECOND CHANCE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS 
> UNPRESIDENTED TASK AND BRIDGE THE GAP OF COMMUNICATION FULLY.
> AS OF LATE THERE HAS BEEN A FLOOD OF NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT SEEMS TO 
BE 
> WORKING AS HOPED WE ARE IN OUR FETAL STAGES BUT I HAVE BEEN TOLD WE 
> WILL BE BROUGHT ALONG SLOWELY AND CAREFULLY.
> 
> SO MY THOUGHTS ARE LETS KEEP THE GOOD VIBES AND HARMONY GOING AND 
BLOCK 
> AS MUCH OF THE NEGATIVITY AS WE CAN AND ALL WORK TOGETHER TWORD 
THIS 
> COMMON GOAL. LETS NOT LET THE SINS OF OUR FATHER SO TO SPEAK AFFECT 
> WHAT WE CAN ACCOMPLISH.
> 
> BRUCE HALLIDAY
>



                         

--0-884082551-1196297098=:78249
